pageTitle: Celo: A platform for fast, secure, stable digital payments
subtitle: A platform for fast, secure, stable digital payments to any mobile number at a fraction of today’s cost.

parallax.1: Your phone number is your bank account.

hero.tag: An open platform for fast, secure, stable digital payments to any mobile number at a fraction of today’s cost.

text.2: means ‘purpose’ in Esperanto. In a similar spirit, we are aiming to create a new platform to connect people globally and bring financial stability to those who need it most. We believe blockchain technology is one of the most exciting innovations in recent history and as a team we look to push the boundaries of what is possible with it today. More importantly, we are driven by purpose -- to solve real-world problems such as lack of access to sound currency, or friction for cash-transfer programs aimed to alleviate poverty. Our mission is to build a monetary system that creates the conditions for prosperity for all.

research.1: As we’re building our mobile-first stable currency, we’re in our target markets doing initial research to better understand our users’ needs. Read more about the market research we’re doing
research.2: In the spirit of decentralization, we’ve established a fellowship program open to those who’d like to collaborate with Celo, from any location and for a flexible amount of time. We’re accepting project proposals now. Please

aboutUsDescription: Our core team, contributors, and backers
applicationsDescription: Build on top of the Celo platform to support global financial inclusion
technologyDescription: Sending money is as easy as sending a text
systemsApproach: We embrace a full-stack approach, reimagining technology at each layer
designedWithCommunities: Our innovations are designed with communities around the world
buildOnCeloCopy: Celo is a platform that is open and open-source, allowing for an ecosystem of powerful applications built on top, including easier cash transfer programs, peer-to-peer lending, collaborative small-scale insurance, and other digital assets and wallets.
poweredByCommunityCopy: Celo's platform is powered by the community. Users can earn currency by hosting software that forwards mobile devices' requests or validates their transactions.
mobileFirstPlatformCopy: To create a truly inclusive financial system, we started by building an infrastructure to serve those excluded from the current system. Celo’s protocol includes unique features that create a seamless user experience on mobile phones.
whitepaperCopy: Celo is a proof-of-stake based blockchain with smart contracts. The technology uses a phone number-based identity system with address-based encryption and eigentrust-based reputation.
stabilityAnalysisCopy: Celo’s stablecoins are stable value currencies, implemented by an algorithmic reserve-backed stabilization mechanism. The first stablecoin, cUSD, tracks the value of the US Dollar.
hero3: Celo is an open platform that makes financial tools accessible to anyone with a mobile phone
workOnCelo: Work on Celo in Berlin, Buenos Aires, San Francisco, and around the world
stayConnectedThanks: Thanks for your contact info! We look forward to having you in the Celo community, expect our newsletter soon.
